sentences.en: Another pathway of organophosphate degradation involves reduction.
sentences.cn: 有机磷酸盐降解的其它途径还包括还原作用.

sentences.en: Diplomacy will smooth your pathway to success.
sentences.cn: 为人圆通会让你成功的道路通畅无阻。

sentences.en: During childhood each of us has to navigate a pathway through a series of developmental stages.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人在童年时都要经历和应对不同的成长阶段。

sentences.en: Follow that pathway and uncover the sweet sunrises that await you.
sentences.cn: 沿路前进,美好的日出正等着你,快去揭开她的面纱吧.

sentences.en: It'suggested that study on different treatment is feasible pathway in TCM individualation.
sentences.cn: 提示开展不同治法的研究是实现中医个体化治疗的可行途径.

sentences.en: Only a steady state, or pathway equilibrium, is reached.
sentences.cn: 所能够达到的只不过是恒态性的平衡.

sentences.en: Richard was coming up the pathway.
sentences.cn: 理查德正沿着小路走过来。

sentences.en: The main energy producing pathway in the leucocyte is glycolysis, resulting in lactate production from glucose.
sentences.cn: 糖酵解, 即从葡萄糖生成乳酸盐,是白细胞产生能量的主要途径.

sentences.en: The nonphosphorylated pathway may be more active in leaf tissue.
sentences.cn: 非磷酸化途径在叶组织中可能更为活跃.

sentences.en: The pathway of conveying is lymphoid and lymphoid transit.
sentences.cn: 转运通路是淋巴和非淋巴转运.

sentences.en: The pathway was rough and covered with little stones.
sentences.cn: 这条路高低不平,铺满了小石头.

sentences.en: They designed every slope, every tree, every pathway, every water.
sentences.cn: 他们设计了每个斜坡, 每棵树, 每条小径, 每道流水.

sentences.en: They walked along the pathway toward the house.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着小路向那所房子走去.

sentences.en: This pathway involves the transamination of prephenate to form pretyrosine.
sentences.cn: 这一途径包括预苯酸的转氨基作用,形成预酪氨酸.

sentences.en: Under low - fat diet, adiponectin signaling pathway components exhibited circadian rhythmicity.
sentences.cn: 在低脂肪饮食, 脂联素信号转导通路组成部分展出昼夜节律性.

trans.tran_en: A pathway is a path that you can walk along or a route that you can take
